definition: (only used in 膈應|膈应[ge4 ying5])
diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]

sentences.english: These diaphragms prevent leakage along the valve stem.
sentences.chinese: 這些橫膈膜防止了沿着閥杆的泄漏。

sentences.english: Performance is further enhanced through the use of a carbon housing and carbon diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 它進一步增強了碳纖維外殼和膈膜的使用。

sentences.english: I have heard of a few diaphragms blowing out in the bypass valve actuators.
sentences.chinese: 我已經聽說過一些橫膈膜在支路閥門作動器爆炸。

sentences.english: The diaphragm and other organs engorge with blood, making him look 'pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 橫膈膜和其它器官充盈鮮血，令他看來象“懷孕者”。

sentences.english: The upper stem is threaded into the diaphragm retainer nut.
sentences.chinese: 手輪下面是一個六角形外螺紋橫膈膜止動螺母。

sentences.english: It is located at chest region above the diaphram.
sentences.chinese: 它分佈在胸腔橫膈膜以上的部位。

sentences.english: Beneath the handwheel is a hexheaded externally-threaded diaphragm-retaining nut.
sentences.chinese: 手輪下面是一個六角形外螺紋橫膈膜止動螺母。

definition: diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]
(only used in 膈應|膈应[ge4 ying5])
